summary: A comprehensive test suite for Prefect's runner and deployment system, covering deployment creation, Docker image handling, work pool interaction, storage loading, schedule management, environment variable propagation, execution limits, remote flow execution, cancellation and crash handling, as well as the serving and server healthâ€‘check components.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of Prefect's workflow execution infrastructure to prevent regressions and ensure reliable operation in production environments.
